name.namePart: Committee on Environment and Public Works

extension.searchTitle: EXECUTIVE SESSION; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 82

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate confirmed the following nomination:<P/>By 82 yeas to 14 nays (Vote No. EX. 127), Robert Lighthizer, of Florida, to be United States Trade Representative, with the rank of Ambassador.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 81 yeas to 15 nays (Vote No. 126), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.

congVote.result: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Under the previous order, the motion to reconsider is considered made and laid upon the table, and the President will be immediately notified of the Senate's action.
